t: Meet Germack Pistachio Co. — Woodward Corner Market
s: April 7, 2025 - Founded by Frank Germack Sr., an Armenian immigrant, the company began as part of the Armenian Import Company in New York City, where pistachios were first introduced to the American market. Frank and his brother John eventually moved to Detroit, establishing what is now one of the city’s most recognized and cherished brands...

t: Germack Pistachio Company | Detroit Historical Society
s: November 27, 2019 - A Detroit staple, Germack Pistachio Company started as and remains a family business. In 1912 Armenian immigrants John and Frank Germack arrived in New York.
